page.title: 15FAIR OAK SOCIAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: Many activities take place in the Village Hall,Parish Church Extension and Hall,Community Centre and at the Wyvern School after school hours. Drama,Song and Dance and Singing Groups meet and perform regularly. Four playgroups and a mother and toddler group are available for pre- school children. Scouts,Guides,Cubs,Brownies and Beavers offer a range of social and organised activities. The Youth Club is a social club for the older pupils of Wyvern school. For the elderly residents there exist two clubs which meet weekly at the Community Centre, a whole day meeting for the housebound and a lunch club, both providing much needed social contact. Another social need, a club for widows, has recently been formed.
